connectorUiConfig.title: Jamf Protect Push Connector
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Jamf Protect](https://www.jamf.com/products/jamf-protect/) connector provides the capability to read raw event data from Jamf Protect in Microsoft Sentinel.

dataTypes.name: jamfprotecttelemetryv2_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
jamfprotecttelemetryv2_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: jamfprotectunifiedlogs_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
jamfprotectunifiedlogs_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: jamfprotecttelemetryv1_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
jamfprotecttelemetryv1_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: jamfprotectalerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
jamfprotectalerts_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
jamfprotecttelemetryv2_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(7d)

jamfprotectunifiedlogs_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(7d)

jamfprotecttelemetryv1_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(7d)

jamfprotectalerts_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(7d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

customs.name: Microsoft Entra
customs.description: Permission to create an app registration in Microsoft Entra ID. Typically requires Entra ID Application Developer role or higher.

customs.name: Microsoft Azure
customs.description: Permission to assign Monitoring Metrics Publisher role on data collection rule (DCR). Typically requires Azure RBAC Owner or User Access Administrator role

instructionSteps.title: 1. Create ARM Resources and Provide the Required Permissions
instructionSteps.description: This connector reads data from the tables that Jamf Protect uses in a Microsoft Analytics Workspace, if the [data forwarding](https://docs.jamf.com/jamf-protect/documentation/Data_Forwarding_to_a_Third_Party_Storage_Solution.html?hl=sentinel#task-4227) option is enabled in Jamf Protect then raw event data is sent to the Microsoft Sentinel Ingestion API.

parameters.content:
#### Automated Configuration and Secure Data Ingestion with Entra Application 
Clicking on "Connect" will trigger the creation of Log Analytics tables and a Data Collection Rule (DCR). 
It will then create an Entra application, link the DCR to it, and set the entered secret in the application. This setup enables data to be sent securely to the DCR using an Entra token.

instructionSteps.title: 2. Push your logs into the workspace
instructionSteps.description: Use the following parameters to configure the your machine to send the logs to the workspace.

parameters.label: Entra Application ID
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the Application ID

parameters.label: Entra Application Secret
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the Application Secret

parameters.label: DCE Uri
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the DCR Uri

parameters.label: DCR Immutable ID
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the DCR ID
